zoedellasartsyfartsy: I’m so sorry Hannah. I have Crohn’s disease, and was recently in the hospital for 6 days. That was my 9th time in, and the 5th operation I’ve had to have this year alone. It’s not easy, especially around the holidays. It can make you severely depressed, I know it did for me. The only words of wisdom that got me through it were from my step mum, who said something along the lines of this: “I know it’s hard, and it might seem like everything’s out of your control. But no matter what you still have your will, your spirit. Hold on to it, don’t let it be crushed by the weight of your illness. You wouldn’t have been dealt this card if you weren’t strong enough to push through it. So push through.” Sending you so much love and strength 💜💜💜
